short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A TrueFire Google Chrome Extension to help you ignite your guitar playing.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Ignite your guitar playing with TrueFire! This Google Chrome Extension is made for TrueFire Students who want to quickly and easily access their lessons and more from TrueFire!
